La condition d’efficacité énergétique n’: Energy efficiency condition not met (greater than {{value}} MWhe/MWhPCS of biomethane injected)
Le coefficient d'efficacité énergétique: The energy efficiency coefficient is calculated on the basis of the electricity consumption for the entire unit (kWe) divided by the quantity of biomethane injected (GWhPCS/year).
kWhe/Nm³ de biogaz à traiter: kWhe/Nm³ of biogas to be treated
La condition d’efficacité énergétique n’: Energy efficiency condition not met (greater than {{value}} KWhe/Nm3)
Le coefficient d'efficacité énergétique: The energy efficiency coefficient is calculated on the basis of the power consumption of the purification system and, where applicable, of vent treatment (kWe) divided by the total quantity of biogas treated by the purification system over the year (Nm3).
Ces informations permettent de vérifier: This information can be used to check compliance with energy efficiency obligations.
Quantité totale de biogaz traitée par le: Total quantity of biogas treated by the purification system over the year (Nm3)
Consommation électrique du système d'épu: Power consumption of purification system and, where applicable, vent treatment (kWe)
Le système d'épuration comprend les unit: The purification system includes the functional units for desulfurization, decarbonization and drying of the biogas, whether or not they are separated during the purification process.
Quantité de biogaz autoconsommée pour la: Quantity of biogas used for pasteurization, hygienization or treatment of inputs, digester heating and biogas purification (Nm3)
Consommation électrique soutirée pour l': Electricity consumption for the entire unit (kWe)
Consommation d’électricité soutirée sur: Consumption of electricity drawn from the public electricity grid by a biomethane production facility, cumulated where applicable with the consumption of the associated injection facility.
Addition de butane ou propane lors de l': Addition of butane or propane when injecting biomethane into the network
Ces informations concernent la productio: This information concerns your plant's final biomethane production.

Transmettre des données fiables pour ass: Transmit reliable data to ensure the development of environmentally-friendly alternative fuels.
Carbure est un outil développé par le Mi: Carbure is a tool developed by the French Ministry of Ecological Transition that enables industry players to easily exchange information on the sustainability of biofuels circulating in France. The tool also provides anonymous public statistics on biofuels incorporated into fossil fuels in France.

Facilité de gestion et gain de temps de: Ease of management and time savings on declarations
Nouvelle barre de navigation et formulai: New navigation bar and contact form
CarbuRe se dote d'un nouveau système de: CarbuRe has a new navigation system. Following a growing number of users, as well as the addition of new renewable energy sources (electricity, SAF) to the tool, we have redesigned the navigation experience to facilitate your day-to-day use.
Nous passons désormais d'une barre de na: We've moved from a navigation bar at the top ⬆️ of the page to a side navigation bar ⬅️ on the left of the tool.
<bold>Comment changer d'entité ?</bold>: <bold>How to change entity?</bold> Go to the top left of the navigation sidebar, open the drop-down menu then click on add entity.
<bold>Où sont mes paramètres ?</bold> Il: <bold>Where are my settings?</bold> They are now located at the bottom left of the page.
<bold>Vous avez besoin d'aide ?</bold> R: <bold>Need help?</bold> Go to Help in the top right-hand corner to complete our contact form.
<bold>Où puis-je trouver mes statistique: <bold>Where can I find my statistics and directory?</bold> I click on my account at the top right.

Infrastructure de recharge installée à l: Recharge infrastructure installed at the location informed:
l'inspecteur confirme avoir trouvé le po: The inspector confirms having found the charge point for the location indicated.Write "yes" or "no" and go to the following steps if the infrastructure has been located;
Identifiant renseigné visible à proximit: Visible informed identifier in the immediate vicinity of the infrastructure :
l'inspecteur précise si l'identifiant re: The inspector specifies if the identifier informed is visible on or in the immediate vicinity of the charging point.The non -visibility of this identifier should not prevent the control if the inspector is able to identify the charge points by other means (indication of the developer/operator for example).Write "yes" or "no" ;
l'inspecteur vérifie le type de courant: The inspector checks the type of current issued by the charging point (from the connector) and indicates it by writing "CC" or "CA"
Numéro du certificat d'examen du type si: Certificate number with type examination if different :
l'inspecteur vérifie la correspondance e: The inspector checks the correspondence between the examination certificate of the type declared by the applicant (recalled in the column "No_mid") and that of the counter installed in the charge point.It leaves the box empty in case of correspondence or indicates the meter number installed if a difference is noted ;
Date du relevé par l'intervenant :: Date of the meter reading by the auditor:
la date de passage de l'inspecteur au fo: The date of passage of the inspector in format DD/MM/YYYY ;
le relevé en kWh, au format XXXX,XX ;: the KWh reading meter, in the format XXXX,XX ;
champ libre permettant d'indiquer tout c: Free field allowing to indicate any circumstance having obstructed the control mission.

Une mise en stock vous permet d'alimente: Stocking allows you to add to your CarbuRe inventory the batches you receive from your various suppliers. Once the procedure is complete, you can manipulate these new stocks from the "Lots in stock" tab on the Transaction page.
Les lots ont été marqués pour incorporat: The batches have been marked for blending!
Le lot a été marqué pour incorporation !: The lot has been marked for blending!
Les lots sélectionnés ont été marqués po: Selected lots have been marked for blending!
En acceptant ces lots, vous indiquez qu': By accepting these batches, you are indicating that they are to be used for blendings in EFS or exercised factories.

Les lots sélectionnés ont été marqués co: Selected lots have been marked as direct delivery!
En acceptant ces lots pour livraison dir: By accepting these batches for direct delivery, you are indicating that they will be used for biofuel blends produced abroad but intended for the French market.
Les lots ont été marqués comme exportati: The lots have been marked as exports!
Le lot a été marqué comme exportation !: The lot was marked as export!
Les lots sélectionnés ont été marqués co: Selected lots have been marked as exports!
En acceptant des lots pour exportation,: By accepting batches for export, you are indicating that they are destined for the foreign market.
La fonctionnalité de transfert vous perm: The transfer function enables you to transfer a batch received from one of your suppliers directly to one of your customers.
Une fois la procédure terminée, vous pou: Once the procedure is complete, you can find your supplier's initial batch in the "Batches received" tab, and the batch transferred to your customer in the "Batches sent" tab.
Les lots ont été transférés au tiers !: The lots have been transferred to third parties!
Le lot a été transféré au tiers !: The lot has been transferred to the third party!

Incorporation des lots par un tiers: blending of lots by a third party
Incorporation du lot par un tiers: blending of the lot by a third party
L'incoporation par un tiers (ou processi: Incoporation by a third party (or processing) involves having the incoporation carried out by an operator other than yourself.
Sur la page \"Société\", vous pouvez con: On the "Company" page, you can configure the repositories concerned by this practice when you specify "third party" or "processing" as the property type, and specify the third-party operator who will handle the blendings.
Une fois le lot accepté, vous pourrez re: Once the batch has been accepted, you can find your supplier's initial batch in the "Received batches" tab, as well as the batch transferred to the third-party operator in the "Sent batches" tab.
